metadata.name: HackTool - Empire UserAgent URI Combo
metadata.comment: Detects user agent and URI paths used by empire agents

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like gecko') AND (lower(LOWER(http_request.url)) in ('/admin/get\\.php', '/news\\.php', '/login/process\\.php')) AND lower(http_request.http_method) = lower('post'))

output.summary: Detects user agent and URI paths used by empire agents

metadata.objective: False positive: Valid requests with this exact user agent to server scripts of the defined names Reference: https://github.com/BC-SECURITY/Empire
